title: Video-Based Mentor Training Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners composed of in-service teachers and education professionals engage asynchronously via an LMS platform, with environments enabling video recording/analysis on individual devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and improve at least three coaching skills by analyzing recorded mentoring videos.
Learners can produce video-based case study reports through peer feedback sessions.
Learners can develop two or more educational scenarios by connecting mentoring theories with practical examples.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
